Job Title: Civil Pre Sales Dealer Enablement Trainer

Location: Westminster, CO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Your Title: Pre Sales Dealer Enablement Trainer

Job Location: Westminster, CO- In Office, Hybrid

Our Department: Field Systems-Civil Construction

Are you passionate about the science behind training and adult learning? 

Do you believe in the importance of technology in civil construction to drive efficiencies, safety, and accuracy?

What You Will Do

The Pre Sales Dealer Enablement Trainer will be responsible for leading the development and deployment of curriculum and content to support the training of dealers for our Civil Construction portfolio — on machine, off machine and office software.

Teach and enable our sellers, internal and dealers, how to sell the Civil Construction offerings, the value proposition of the solutions for the contractor’s business, understand contractor pain points and speak to those in a sales demo. Develop and deploy content via elearning sites, virtual led training and in person training. Work closely with the business to understand product messaging, customer value proposition and workflows and translate into learning content and coordinate with the Post Sales Dealer Training team on an as needed basisUnderstand the need for systematic and objective methodologies for tracking engagement, content quality and relevancy, trainee development and skills gaps Provide structured feedback from sellers to the marketing team that can be leveraged to inform product development

What Skills & Experience You Should Bring

Understanding of the civil construction industry, target markets and customers along with Trimble offerings for civil construction contractorsAbility to develop structured curriculum, content, and deployment programs, including a train-the-trainer programUnderstanding of what it means to teach sellers how to sell a product vs train the customer post-salesStrong systems mindset with the ability to create clear structure and organization from multiple inputs and viewsHigh level of comfort with technology for deployment — e-learning websites, video conferencing

About Your Location

This role will report out of the Westminster, Colorado Trimble office. The expectation is that the individual that will fill this role is able to operate as an “onsite” or as a “hybrid” employee, reporting to the office 3-5 days per week

About Our Civil Construction Division

Trimble Civil Construction provides technology solutions to get the job done right the first time. From the office to the field, Trimble has a wide range of technology solutions to make our customers more profitable, and sustainable and enable rapid decision-making.
